EmailTemplate.subject: Here’s what 20% OFF looks like
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View Online <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/default.aspx?cmp=EBBSFEB2019&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/catalog/Cleaning-Maintenance/_/N-dxp?cmp=EBGRFEB2019EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> That’s right. Spend $75 or more on select cleaning, health & safety or breakroom supplies and get 20% OFF. Simply restock your office before March 1. Some exceptions apply, see terms for details. Use code 19SAVE20 at checkout Bathroom & Paper Supplies Cleaners & Detergent Candy & Snacks <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/browse/First-Aid-Kits-Medical-Supplies/_/N-cyg?cmp=EBGRFIRSTAID19EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> First Aid Kits <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/browse/Garbage-Recycling/_/N-dzz?cmp=EBGRRECYCLING19EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Garbage & Recycling Save Now! <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/catalog/Cleaning-Maintenance/_/N-dxp?cmp=EBGRFEB2019EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/category/_/N-1z0czra?cmp=EBBIGDEALSEN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Customer Service <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/contact-us.aspx?cmp=EBCUSTOMERCARE2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Terms & Conditions <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/terms-and-conditions.aspx?cmp=EBTERMS2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Privacy Policy <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/privacy-policy.aspx?cmp=EBPRIVACY2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> Grand & Toy | 200 Aviva Park Drive, Vaughan, ON L4L9C7 | 1-866-391-8111
*Must sign in to your account to use promo code. Offer valid at grandandtoy.com only. Enter promo code 19SAVE20 at checkout. Must spend $75 or more on selected facility supply products to save 20% off selected facility products ONLY. Void if copied, sold, purchased, transferred, taxed or where prohibited. Cannot be combined with any other coupon, associate discount, or any other offers. Not valid on E92BPW16 Energizer Max AAA 16Pack, RC75552 Lysol Wipes Citrus 35 CT, 75553 Lysol Wipes Spring 35CT, 298TERRA Alkaline Battery Zero Waste BX, KB150 Keurig B150 Brewer, KB155 Keurig B155 Office Brewer, 3030200 Green Tea Tag & Envelope, 624540 Coffee Filter Paper White No.4, 11GT239 K Cup Tm Irish Cream 24's, E91BPW24 Energizer Max AA 24pack, 050502 Sqwincher 64 OZ Lite Fruit Pun, 050507 Sqwincher 64 OZ Lite Orange, KB150P Keurig B150 Plumbed Brewer, 060100-0 Sqwincher Qwik Stik ORNG060100, 060101 Sqwincher Qwik Stikmixed Berry, 060102 Sqwincher Qwik Stik Fruit Punc, 060453 Sqwincher Qwik Stik Strawberry, 11GT100 Club Coff CL 100% Col 42x2 OZ, 11GT333 Mccafe Kcup Med DK Roast 30PK, 030332 Sqwincher 64 OZ Concentratetro, 030333 Sqwincher 64 OZ Concentrate LE, 030335 Sqwincher 64 OZ Concentrate FR, 030337 Sqwincher 64 OZ Concentrate MI, 030338 Sqwincher 64 OZ Concentrate LE, 030339 Sqwincher 64 OZ Concentrate GR, 01CO110 Coke -
